name: Iron Man
bio: Genius billionaire Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, created a high-tech suit of armor to save the world from various threats.

name: Captain America
bio: Steve Rogers, also known as Captain America, is a super-soldier and the first Avenger who fought against evil during World War II.

name: Thor
bio: Thor Odinson, the God of Thunder, wields the enchanted hammer Mjolnir and protects the Nine Realms from various threats.

name: Hulk
bio: Dr. Bruce Banner transforms into the Hulk, a green-skinned giant with immense strength, whenever he gets angry or excited.

name: Black Widow
bio: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, is a highly skilled spy and assassin who has trained extensively in martial arts.

name: Hawkeye
bio: Clint Barton, known as Hawkeye, is an exceptional marksman and skilled archer who never misses his target.

name: Black Panther
bio: T'Challa, the Black Panther and king of Wakanda, possesses enhanced abilities and protects his nation using advanced technology.

name: Doctor Strange
bio: Dr. Stephen Strange, a brilliant neurosurgeon, becomes the Master of the Mystic Arts and protects the Earth from supernatural threats.

name: Spider-Man
bio: Peter Parker, also known as Spider-Man, is a young superhero with incredible agility, wall-crawling abilities, and a web-shooting device.

name: Scarlet Witch
bio: Wanda Maximoff, known as Scarlet Witch, possesses reality-altering powers and is one of the most powerful mutants in the Marvel Universe.

name: Ant-Man
bio: Scott Lang, the Ant-Man, can shrink in size and communicate with ants using his advanced suit and helmet.

name: Captain Marvel
bio: Carol Danvers, also known as Captain Marvel, is a powerful superhero with cosmic powers and the ability to fly.

name: Vision
bio: Vision is an android created by Tony Stark and Bruce Banner, possessing a synthetic body and the Mind Stone.

name: Wasp
bio: Hope van Dyne, also known as the Wasp, has a suit that allows her to shrink in size and fly using wings.

name: Falcon
bio: Sam Wilson, known as Falcon, is an expert pilot who uses a winged suit and advanced weaponry to fight crime.

name: War Machine
bio: James Rhodes, also known as War Machine, is a highly skilled pilot who operates a heavily armed suit of armor.

name: Winter Soldier
bio: Bucky Barnes, the Winter Soldier, is a former HYDRA assassin with enhanced strength and combat skills.
